rule.description: Short-time multiple Windows Defender error events
Short-time multiple Windows Defender warning events
Windows Defender: Antimalware engine found $(win.eventdata.severityName) malware or other potentially unwanted software
Windows Defender: Antimalware platform encountered a critical error when attempting to perform an action over the potentially unwanted software
Screen capture method invoked from PowerShell script.
Multiple Windows critical events.
Administrators group changed.
Enterprise domain controllers group changed.
Domain admins group changed.
Domain guests group changed.
Domain controllers group changed.

Enterprise admins group changed.
Guests group changed.

Windows Defender: Antimalware platform detected $(win.eventdata.severityName) potentially unwanted software ($(win.eventdata.processName))

Windows Defender: detected potentially unwanted software
New Windows Service Created to start from windows root path. Suspicious event as the binary may have been dropped using Windows Admin Shares.
Windows critical event.
Multiple Windows error events.
Cert publishers group changed.
Group policy creator owners group changed.
RAS and IAS servers group changed.
Power users group changed.
Account operators group changed.
Server operators group changed.
Replicators group changed.

Denied RODC password replication group changed.
Event log readers group changed.
Certificate service DCOM access group changed.
Windows DC integrity check on decrypted field failed.
Windows DC - Possible replay attack.
Multiple failed attempts to perform a privileged operation by the same user.
Multiple Windows logon failures.
Multiple Windows audit failure events.
Multiple Windows error security events.
Multiple Windows warning security events.
Multiple Windows error application events.
Multiple Windows warning application events.
Multiple System warning events
The browser driver has received too many illegal datagrams from the remote computer
The browser driver has discarded too many mailslot messages
Some errors occur aproximately every three seconds
Multiple Windows Defender error events
Multiple Windows Defender warning events
Windows Defender: $(win.eventdata.feature) real-time protection encountered an error and failed
Windows Defender: Antivirus scanning for malware and other potentially unwanted software is disabled
Windows Defender: Antivirus scanning for viruses is disabled
Multiple Eventlog error events
Multiple Eventlog warning events
Multiple remote access login failures
Multiple TS Gateway login failures
Multiple Windows Firewall With Advanced Security warning events
Multiple Windows Firewall With Advanced Security error events
Windows malware detected.
Windows Adware/Spyware application found.
User account locked out (multiple login errors).
Windows audit log was cleared.
Windows application error event.
Critical Error: System low on resources.
The COM+ event system ran out of memory during its internal processing.
The winlogon notification subscriber failed a critical notification event.
MS DTC run out of memory.
A critical error occurred in an MS DTC component, process terminating.
An MS DTC component was unable to allocate memory for a critical operation.
Illegal transition caused fatal error.
Out of memory caused fatal error.
Received unknown connection manager message type.
The process was terminated due to an unhandled exception.
.NET Runtime - Fatal execution engine error.
Windows System critical event
The system stopped responding, crashed or lost power unexpectedly
